definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

sentences.english: And the Philistine came on and drew near unto David; and the man that bare the shield went before him.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人也渐渐的迎着大卫来拿盾牌的走在前头。

sentences.english: The man went ahead of us to clear the course.
sentences.chinese: 这个人走在我们前头开路。

sentences.english: Once again, Bolt clowned incessantly before the race.
sentences.chinese: 博尔特再一次跑在了最前头。

sentences.english: In each of the first carts sat six invalid criminal convicts, close packed.
sentences.chinese: 前头的大车每辆坐着六个刑事犯，很拥挤。

sentences.english: Now God is down in front.
He was ready to charge to the fore for the defence of our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 他随时准备冲在前头来保卫祖国。

sentences.english: She elbowed her way through the masses of tourists.
sentences.chinese: 这个人走在我们前头开路。

sentences.english: Susie nicked in ahead of us when we went through the woods.
sentences.chinese: 穿越森林时，苏茜抄近路抢到了我们的前头。

sentences.english: The Oriental shepherd was always ahead of his sheep.
sentences.chinese: 在东方的旷野中，牧童总是走在羊群前头的。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the Philistine, with his shield bearer in front of him, kept coming closer to David.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人也渐渐地迎着大卫来，拿盾牌的走在前头。

sentences.english: Suddenly, at a wider place, the car ahead pulled off the road.
sentences.chinese: 突然，在宽一点的地方，前头的车开到了一旁。

sentences.english: It means taking the lead and marching in the forefront of the revolutionary ranks.
sentences.chinese: 就是带头作用，就是站在革命队伍的前头。

sentences.english: Tom nicked in ahead of us before we arrived at the station.
sentences.chinese: 在我们到达车站之前，汤姆抄近路赶到了我们的前头。

sentences.english: We must head 'em off the boats.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须赶在他们前头把小船夺过来。

sentences.english: A thousand sails pass by the wrecked ship; ten thousand saplings shoot up beyond the withered tree.
sentences.chinese: 沉船的旁边正有千帆驶过，病树的前头却是万木争春。

sentences.english: I beat him to the parking space.
sentences.chinese: 我赶在他前头占了那停车位置。

definition: in front/in advance of the field
to open up a path/to make one's way through/to construct a road/(electricity) open circuit
(of children, parents etc) at one's side/living with one
the front (of)/(in) front/(in) sb's presence/just before (a date)
to come close/to get near to/front
back of the line/last one in line
to take the lead/to be first to start
